statements: SELECT * FROM genetics_clinical_data;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_info FROM genetics_clinical_data WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT clinical_records FROM genetics_clinical_data WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetics_clinical_data WHERE genetic_info @> '{"bloodType": "AB+"}';
SELECT DISTINCT genetic_info->>'gender' AS gender FROM genetics_clinical_data;
SELECT * FROM genetics_clinical_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT clinical_records FROM genetics_clinical_data WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT genetic_info->'father_name' AS father_name, genetic_info->'mother_name' AS mother_name FROM genetics_clinical_data;
SELECT * FROM genetics_clinical_data WHERE genetic_info @> '{"blood_type": "AB+"}' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM genetics_clinical_data;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, medication FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, visit_date FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, genetic_data FROM patients WHERE age < 50 LIMIT 3;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, medication FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE medication LIKE '%acetaminophen%';
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_data FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM clinical_records WHERE visit_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY visit_date;
SELECT genomic_data.sample_id, genomic_data.mutation_type, patient_data.patient_name FROM genomic_data INNER JOIN patient_data ON genomic_data.patient_id = patient_data.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' LIMIT 5
SELECT pd.patient_name, cr.diagnosis, cr.treatment_plan FROM patient_data pd JOIN clinical_records cr ON pd.patient_id = cr.patient_id
SELECT gd.sample_id, gd.dna_sequence, cr.diagnosis FROM genomic_data gd JOIN clinical_records cr ON gd.patient_id = cr.patient_id
SELECT pd.patient_name, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM patient_data pd JOIN clinical_records cr ON pd.patient_id = cr.patient_id GROUP BY pd.patient_name ORDER BY visit_count DESC
SELECT * FROM GeneticData;
SELECT patient_id, gene_name FROM GeneticData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientInfo ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalRecords WHERE record_type = 'diagnosis';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_plan FROM PrecisionMedicine WHERE outcome = 'success';
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT * FROM ClinicalRecords WHERE record_type = 'Diagnosis' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientInfo WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 50;
SELECT * FROM PrecisionMedicine ORDER BY treatment_plan ASC, patient_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.patient_name, g.gene_name, pm.treatment_plan FROM PatientInfo p JOIN GeneticData g ON p.id = g.patient_id JOIN PrecisionMedicine pm ON p.id = pm.patient_id WHERE pm.outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM clinical_records ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, condition, doctor_name FROM patients JOIN clinical_records ON patients.patient_id = clinical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' AND diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT pr.record_id, pr.visit_date, tr.treatment_name, tr.dosage FROM clinical_records pr JOIN treatments tr ON pr.record_id = tr.record_id WHERE tr.dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY pr.visit_date DESC;

SELECT lr.test_name, lr.result_value, lr.units, cr.visit_date FROM lab_results lr JOIN clinical_records cr ON lr.record_id = cr.record_id WHERE lr.result_value > 100 ORDER BY cr.visit_date ASC, lr.test_name;

SELECT p.patient_name, p.age, cr.visit_date, tr.treatment_name, lr.test_name, lr.result_value, lr.units FROM patients p JOIN clinical_records cr ON p.patient_id = cr.patient_id JOIN treatments tr ON cr.record_id = tr.record_id JOIN lab_results lr ON cr.record_id = lr.record_id WHERE lr.result_value < 50 ORDER BY p.age DESC, cr.visit_date ASC;
